story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - TEREX CORP. (TEX.N) Current Prior Rating Sell Buy Price target $60 $66 --Citigroup said the downgrade was based both on valuation, as the shares had risen 1,067 percent over the last 4 years and also on forecasts for end markets that are losing steam. --Shares of the company fell 6.7 percent to $60.25 in morning trade on the New York Stock Exchange. (Reporting by Manish Gupta in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - citigroup cuts terex to sell
